Text.Page: Already we see native plants and animals recovering from near extinction. Eclipse thistles have many medicinal properties.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"They're useful?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

The thistles? Yes, if properly prepared.

Gather up a bunch and take them to Lenorele at {@Rgn:47006$$Field Base Lunacy} if you're headed that way. She'll know what to do with them.
Thank you. These will make a potion to counter the effect of the argon contamination. Gods know we need it.
